Entries.dad5: @에게 ^ I sent your nursemaid Bella because I was worried about you and your grandchildren. She must have arrived at your farm by now. Bella is a childhood friend as you know, so you should treat her with care! ^ Dear Dad[#] Dad's Letter #5

Entries.Bella: It's very windy, Master. I recommend you refrain from going out today..$k

Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Bella: Master, I came here after hearing that you collapsed in the mine. #$b# This is a potion I made in case something like this happens. I hope you take this and regain your strength..[773]$0
Entries.Town_DumpsterDiveComment_Bella: ...Master, I will keep it a secret..

Entries.Bella: I heard that the winner of the egg festival will be given a hat as a prize. I hope you win, Master..
I will be watching from outside the stage with you, Master and Lady. Have a nice trip, Master..

This year's luau soup will be delicious, I promise. #$b# If the soup doesn't taste good even though it contains the crops you grew, it's because of the residents who made the unpalatable combination. #$b# If the soup doesn't taste good, I'll make some sandwiches for you and your young lady for lunch.
I heard that on the last day of summer in Stardew Valley, Lunalu come to the beach and dance. That sounds fun. #$b#I'm looking forward to it.$1
The crops you grow are very special, so you will definitely win first place in this competition..$h
In that maze... something smells strange. Be careful, master..
Last night while the master was sleeping, I prepared the fishing rod. I hope you win the ice fishing competition..$1
The young master and the young lady are looking forward to finding out who their secret friend is. I hope you receive a wonderful gift..$h

Entries.16554812: none/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "#$q 305/306/307 Null#Greetings, Master... I've been watching over you, you know... Learning everything about you. When you wake up, when you go to sleep... who you spend time with. After the watching turn, I confidnet right now that I'm to take the role of/pause 300/./pause 300/./pause 300/. being your maid.#$r 306 Bella_16554812_fast#That a little bit too fast, who are you again? #$r 305 Bella_16554812_nonchalant#Ok? #$r 307 Bella_16554812_worried#Why are you watching me? What for?"
Entries.Bella_16554812_fast: #$q 205/206 Null#Oh, Master... I was Bella, didn't your grandfather told you about me?. I'm just a maid being sent here to serve you after all.$h#$r 205 Bella_fast_intense#Ok ok#$r 206 Bella_fast_nonchalant#You being sent by my grandfather? Really?
Entries.Bella_fast_intense: That's better, master. I will be moving in right now.$2
Entries.Bella_fast_nonchalant: #$q 001 Null #Really, didn't you grandfather told you about this in the second letter?%1#$r 001 Bella_fast_nonchalant_1#I don't remember anything about this.#$r 001 Bella_fast_nonchalant_1#I don't know what you're talking about.
Entries.Bella_fast_nonchalant_1: Maybe the letter was lost in the mail? Anyway I will be moving in right now, my hand getting tired from holding these bags.$2
Entries.Bella_16554812_nonchalant: Huh... I see... I will be moving in right now.$3
Entries.Bella_16554812_worried: #$q 205/206 #Master, don't be so scared, Bella won't hurt you.$h#$r 205 Bella_worried_intense#Uhm ok ok

Entries.NPC.cs.4274: Did you remember my birthday? Thank you very much, Master!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4275: Birthday present, I really like it, Master! Thank you for celebrating my birthday.!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4276: Oh, it must be my birthday today! Thank you so much for remembering, Master.!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4277: You remembered my birthday! Thank you so much, Master.!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4278: Thank you for the birthday present, Master.. $0
Entries.NPC.cs.4279: ...Thank you for the birthday gift, Master.. $0
Entries.NPC.cs.4280: It's a birthday present. Thank you, Master..$0
Entries.NPC.cs.4281: Oh, it's a birthday present. Thank you, Master..$0

Entries.MovieInvite_InvitedBySomeoneElse_Bella: Sorry... I have a movie appointment with someone else. I'll see you at the theater..
Entries.MovieInvite_FarmerAlreadySeen_Bella: I'm sorry... I have to take care of you as your maid..
Entries.MovieInvite_AlreadySeen: Sorry, I saw a movie this week....$2
Entries.MovieInvite_Invited_Bella: ..!#$b#After finishing the housework, I'll follow you right away.#$b#I'm looking forward to watching the movie with my master..$h
Entries.MovieInvite_Rejected: Sorry... I'm busy with housework so I don't think I can go.$2
